attributes.action: Prevent publishers selling works written by  Civil Servants of all classes to Public Libraries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not approve of British service personnel making money from stories they might tell. However. Our Honourable and Right Honourable Members have no scruples at all about writing of their experiences whilst in public office. They would perhaps be less keen if the British Library Service was not required to buy their work!
